full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA MAndAL BZHI PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,('DI NI RJO BO RJE'I PHYAG LEN SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA'I RGYA MTSO'I 'JUG DGOS NAS JI LTAR 'BYUNG BA BZHIN PHRAN BU BYAMS PAS ZIN BRIS RIGS PA TZAM 'PHRAL BDER BKOD PA'O, ,) RJE BTZUN BLA MA NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA YI, ,GSUNG BZHIN RNAM DKAR @003B DGE BAS PAR DU BSKRUN, ,'DI PAm KA RA SENG LDENG NAGS KYI SGROL, ,MAndAL BZHI PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL 'DI, ,DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG TSE BRTAN DANG BZHENGS DGES, ,MAR RGAN GYIS TSON ZAS 'BREL THOG TSAD KUN, ,ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU SKYE BAR SHOG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
